title: You wanted the assassin meta, you got it, shitters.
body: Remember back on boards when all of you begged for nerfs to Lulu, Soraka, Orianna, Ziggs, and every other utility/poke mid because they either countered assassins or had enough strength to be viable picks against assassins? Well here we are. Don't complain when assassins with overloaded mobility and burst damage are shitting on you because "assassin meta is fun, mage mid meta was boooooooooooring". Being 0/0/0 aginst Lulu is so much better than being 0/4/0 against Zed.
